title: War in Ukraine: Uni to uniform - Ukraine's new teenage army recruits
description: Young volunteers swap their studies for assault rifles as they prepare to defend Kyiv from Russian forces.

title: West Indies draw a huge step forward, says England captain Root
description: England's draw against West Indies in the first Test is a "huge step forward" after a "difficult year", says captain Joe Root.

title: Roman Abramovich: Rabbi investigated over Portuguese citizenship
description: Daniel Litvak helped Russian billionaire Roman Abramovich obtain Portuguese citizenship.

title: How England's 14 men whipped up Twickenham crowd with stirring display in defeat
description: England shred the script that came with Charlie Ewels' early red card with a performance of ferocious defence and unstinting belief.

title: Saudi Arabia executes 81 men in one day
description: The range of charges on which the men were convicted included terrorism and holding "deviant beliefs".

title: Roman Abramovich: Premier League disqualifies Chelsea owner as director of club
description: The Premier League disqualifies Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich as a director of the club after the oligarch was sanctioned by the UK government.

title: Maxime Cressy serves bizarre 26mph ace at Indian Wells against Christopher Eubanks
description: Maxime Cressy stuns his opponent Christopher Eubanks by serving a 26mph ace that catches the wind and drops on Eubanks' side of the net.

title: Ukraine war: Pictures of war intensifying in third week
description: Images from Russia's invasion of Ukraine show a conflict turning deadlier nearly three weeks on.

title: Ukraine invasion: Javid says Russia will pay for war crimes as UK sends aid
description: The UK says it is sending more medical aid to Ukraine after 25 attacks on health centres.

title: Ukraine: Labour MP Rosena Allin-Khan helps aid effort
description: Dr Rosena Allin-Khan, MP for Tooting, says doctors in Ukraine fear a chemical attack.

title: Cost of living: Energy bills to rise 14 times faster than wages, says TUC
description: An analysis by the Trades Union Congress suggests bills will rise 14 times faster than pay this year.

title: Raducanu into Indian Wells third round with win over Garcia
description: Emma Raducanu gets past Caroline Garcia, while fellow Briton Harriet Dart overcomes Elina Svitolina to reach the third round at Indian Wells.

title: Watch: Otters in Singapore cross road with police escort
description: Why did the otters cross the road? They were outside Singapore's presidential palace, so that may be a clue.

title: The friends who explore abandoned buildings
description: Alex, Alistair and Theo are among a community of "urban explorers" who document the history of decaying structures.

title: Martin Compston: Plucked to stardom from a school corridor
description: The Scot made his acting debut in Ken Loach's gritty drama Sweet Sixteen, released 20 years ago.

title: Ukraine war: I fear my family are silently dying in Mariupol
description: A Ukraine-born teacher in Scotland has lost communication with her mother and brother in Mariupol.

title: Ukraine war: Protests after Russians 'abduct' Melitopol mayor
description: The president accuses the Russians of "moving to a new stage of terror" as Melitopol residents protest.

title: Console 'scalper' on stockpiling PlayStations for profit
description: Omar Mehtab spoke to a 'scalper;' a person who stockpiles popular products and resells them for profit.

title: Farming Wales: The farmer making vodka from sheep milk
description: Bryn Perry, from Pembrokeshire, recycles leftover whey from his cheese-making to produce the spirit.

title: ‘This world is crazy but music helps me survive’
description: A musician asylum seeker from Iran is reunited with his instrument in Northern Ireland.

title: Six Nations: 'Ireland will demand new level from new England'
description: England have promised physicality, but will also need unseen accuracy and ambition to derail a resurgent Ireland in Twickenham showdown.

title: The Papers: Kyiv faces siege and UK under fire over refugees
description: The coming battle for Ukraine's capital and the ongoing fallout dominates the headlines.

title: Women's World Cup: 'Sensational!' - Matthews takes brilliant catch to remove Sharma
description: West Indies' Hayley Matthews takes a "sensational" catch at first slip to remove India's Deepti Sharma during their Women's World Cup match in Hamilton.

title: Fears funeral plan reforms could mean thousands lose money
description: There is growing concern that tougher regulations for funeral plan providers could hit many customers.

title: Ukraine: Spam website set up to reach millions of Russians
description: A Norwegian computer expert has made a system for volunteers to email millions of Russian people about the war

title: War in Ukraine: How Russia is recruiting mercenaries
description: Social media channels and private messaging groups are being used to recruit, the BBC has learned.

title: Under threat of Russian bombs, Lviv hides away its priceless heritage
description: The picturesque western city of Lviv is racing to protect is cultural and religious artefacts.

title: 'We were the better team' - Biggar 'annoyed and disappointed' as Wales lose to France
description: Wales captain Dan Biggar admits he felt "frustrated, annoyed and disappointed" following their Six Nations defeat by France.

title: The race is on for affordable energy for the UK's homes and businesses
description: War in Ukraine has focused minds on how to get enough affordable energy for homes and businesses.

title: Ukraine: How China is censoring online discussion of the war
description: The authorities are struggling to keep a lid on pro- and anti-Russian views being discussed online.

title: 'Reselling PlayStations keeps a roof over my head'
description: How so-called scalpers use online bots to snap up consoles and resell them for profit.

title: Week in pictures: 5-11 March 2022
description: A selection of powerful images from all over the globe, taken in the past seven days.

title: Building a bigger home for the British Library collection
description: What do you do when your collection of millions of books keeps growing but your bookshelves don't?

title: Intimate image abuse: His confession protected him
description: Georgie received an anonymous tip-off on Facebook that intimate photos of her were being shared online.

title: Ukraine war: Ukrainians mourn their fallen soldiers
description: Funerals are held for the first Ukrainian victims of the Ukraine-Russia war.
